oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1942-10-10 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 10, 1942. Featuring Jud Collins (announcer), George D. Hay (host), and performers Roy Acuff, Bashful Brother Oswald, Howdy Forrester, and Mac McGar. Held at War Memorial Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Howdy Forrester; Roy Acuff; Mac McGar
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Prince Albert commercial (George D. Hay, Jud Collins) -- George D. Hay introduces Howdy Forrester -- Fire In The Mountain (Howdy Forrester) -- Jud Collins talks -- Fuel conservation P.S.A. (Jud Collins, George D. Hay) -- George D. Hay introduces Roy Acuff -- The Heart That Was Broken For Me (Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert commercial (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- George D. Hay introduces Mac McGar -- Wake Up Susan (Mac McGar) -- Prince Albert commercial (Jud Collins, Roy Acuff) -- George D. Hay introduces Roy Acuff -- Ida Red (Roy Acuff) -- Closing statement (George D. Hay, Bashful Brother Oswald)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Collins, Jud; Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Bashful Brother Oswald; Acuff, Roy; Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; McGar, Mac
